bike.description: FACT 11r carbon, FACT IS construction, aero tube shape, compact race design, tapered 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" head tube, internal cable routing, carbon OSBB

components.description: Venge Pro FACT carbon, full monocoque, OS race for 1-3/8" bearing
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, w/ custom Venge top cap
Venge Aero, FACT carbon, flippable 20/0mm offset
Carbon chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
